text:
BAMTech | Chelsea Market Building, NYC | Senior Software Engineer | Full-time | Onsite

BAMTech’s media team, a subsidiary of MLB Advanced Media, is looking for talented engineers to help build out our Live & VOD Media Production Pipelines. It’s a unique opportunity to not only work on products such as MLB.TV, NHL.TV, HBO NOW and PlayStation Vue but also to enjoy using them.

https://boards.greenhouse.io/majorleaguebaseballadvancedmedi...
